news_header: Israel conducted targeted attacks on Iranian military sites in response to months of Iranian aggression, with the Israeli military stating they will continue if provoked. Iran reported explosions and claimed to have successfully defended against the attacks. The U.S. was informed in advance and encouraged limited responses.
news_text: Israel announced it has executed precise strikes on Iranian military installations, claiming these actions were a response to ongoing Iranian attacks on Israel. The Israeli military stated that while the recent attacks have concluded, further action will be taken if Iran escalates tensions. Reports from Iran indicated multiple explosions in Tehran, with Iranian officials asserting that their air defense systems successfully repelled the Israeli strikes, although they acknowledged a limited conflict had emerged. Additionally, military targets in Syria were reportedly attacked, and the U.S. government was pre-informed about these operations. The Biden administration has advised Israel to maintain targeted and restrained responses to minimize risks to civilians, while also warning of serious repercussions for Iranian aggression. U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris was kept updated on the situation.
